name: Benzonatate

contraindications.text: adults children 10 years age : usual dose one 100 mg 200 mg capsule three times day needed cough . necessary control cough , 600 mg daily three divided doses may given . benzonatate swallowed whole.benzonatate capsules broken , chewed , dissolved , cut crushed .

warningsAndPrecautions: benzonatate capsules usp , 100 mg : yellow soft gelatin capsules , imprinted `` pa46 `` , available bottles 500 's ( ndc 72162-1913-5 ) capsules protected light , moisture humidity , stored controlled room temperature 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp ] . dispense tight , light-resistant container defined usp/nf . repackaged/relabeled : bryant ranch prepack , inc.burbank , ca 91504
indications_original: BENZONATATE is indicated for the symptomatic relief of cough.
contraindications_original:
Adults and Children over 10 years of age: Usual dose is one 100 mg or 200 mg capsule three times a day as needed for cough. If necessary to control cough, up to 600 mg daily in three divided doses may be given.
 
  BENZONATATE should be swallowed whole.BENZONATATE Capsules are not to be broken, chewed, dissolved, cut or crushed.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Benzonatate Capsules USP, 100 mg: Yellow soft gelatin capsules, imprinted with "PA46", available in bottles of 500's (NDC 72162-1913-5)
                  The capsules should be protected from light, moisture and humidity, and stored at controlled room temperature 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [See USP].
                  Dispense in a tight, light-resistant container as defined in USP/NF.
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions_original: Hypersensitivity to benzonatate or related compounds.
